citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 6/3/14 at 11:00 AM to do a facility inspection.
* Licensee told USDA inspectors they had prior commitments that required them to be leaving shortly after
inspector arrival to the facility. It was decided that adequate time to perform a full inspection at this site could not be
done. Home inspector did acquire optimal hours of inspection availability from the licensee.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*  A facility representative was not available on 6/3/14 at  11:00 AM to do a facility inspection.
*   Licensee told USDA inspectors they had prior commitments that required them to be leaving shortly after
inspector arrival to the facility.  It was decided that adequate time to perform a full inspection at this site could not be
done.   Home inspector did acquire optimal hours of inspection availability from the licensee.      
*   Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
